• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players dig for ores, build structures, and trade resources.
  • Features include procedurally generated maps, real-time multiplayer via MQTT, an in-game shop, and cloud save functionality.
  • Mobile controls are available with on-screen D-pad and action buttons, while desktop uses keyboard input.
  • Players can upgrade their drill, hull, fuel, and cargo capacity, and discover teleporters for fast travel.
  • The game includes admin controls for server management, save/load systems, and mod support.

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time resource gathering, trading, and building mechanics. Players explore procedurally generated caves, upgrade their equipment, and interact with others through an MQTT-based networking system. The game supports both desktop and mobile play with responsive controls, cloud saves, and admin features for server management.
